name: Rule 1A Incremental
description:
Grow your subreddit as much as you can while fighting against those who just don't want to stop breaking Rule 1A!

Content:

  • Double Prestige
  • Upgrades
  • Automation
  • A bit of strategy!
  • Reddit Inspired UI
  • Monospace Font
  • Jokes

Discord: https://discord.gg/jb7RV55tzW

Note: 

For those not aware, Rule 1A is a rule in the r/incremental_games subreddit that gets broken a lot.

The rule is: "Don't post the following: (A) requests for help finding games".

This game is for comedic purposes and not to target anyone.
